entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 04:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -15.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
